Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“What’s taking so long!?{Line} Hurry up!!!”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“What’s taking so long!?{Line} Hurry up!!!”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“You!{Line} Help us secure this area!”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“You!{Line} Help us secure this area!”

Monologue.Current: We’ve been assigned to another area{Line}Enough of this pretending
Monologue.Original: We’ve been assigned to another area{Line}Enough of this pretending

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“We’ve been assigned{Line} to another area.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“We’ve been assigned{Line} to another area.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Get out of our way.{Line} We’re with the headmaster.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Get out of our way.{Line} We’re with the headmaster.”

Monologue.Current: “Another one of Cid’s followers!? DIE!”
Monologue.Original: “Another one of Cid’s followers!? DIE!”

Monologue.Current: “Всё-таки, настоящая бумажная{Line} книга в руках куда лучше{Line} безжизненной электронной копии.”
Monologue.Original: “No matter what era,{Line} I think books are good.”

Monologue.Current: “Конечно, пользоваться терминалом{Line} намного удобнее - быстрый поиск,{Line} удобный формат, и не нужно никуда{Line} ходить... Но я всё равно предпочитаю{Line} книги.”
Monologue.Original: “It’s kinda nice to be able to{Line} read from the terminal, but{Line} I still prefer books.”

Monologue.Current: “Книги будут всегда и везде,{Line} как бы далеко не ушёл{Line} технический прогресс!”
Monologue.Original: “No matter how technologically{Line} advanced we get, I betcha{Line} books will always be around.”

Monologue.Current: “Ух ты! Не ожидал встретить{Line} тебя в библиотеке!”
Monologue.Original: “Wow! Didn’t expect to{Line} see you in the library!”

Monologue.Current: “Привет...{Pause 48}{Line} Пока...”
Monologue.Original: “Hi.{Pause 48}{Line} Later.”

Monologue.Current: “Утро!{Line} Как же здорово я себя чувствую!”
Monologue.Original: “Morning!{Line} I feel great!”

Monologue.Current: “Утро...{Line} Как же...{Pause 48} уныло {Line} всё вокруг...”
Monologue.Original: “Morning...{Line} I feel a bit...{Pause 48}{Line} blue today...”{Next}“NOT!”

Monologue.Current: “Доооброе утрооо!!!”
Monologue.Original: “Gooood morningggg!”

Monologue.Current: “Каждый сид должен{Line} продолжать учиться!”
Monologue.Original: “Even SeeDs have to{Line} keep studying.”

Monologue.Current: “Занимаешься? Я поражена!”
Monologue.Original: “Studying in the library!?{Line} I’m impressed!”

Monologue.Current: “Эй! Сыграем?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “HEY!!! So you wanna play!?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
Monologue.Original: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.

Monologue.Current: “Утро! Сыграем?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “Morning! Cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
Monologue.Original: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
